# vendorName

**Instance Property**

The human-readable name of the manufacturer or vendor of the physical device as a person would understand it.

## Declaration

```swift
let vendorName: String
```

## Discussion

The system receives this data from the device within an DNS-SD TXT record. The value set in the `vendorName` property is the  value that follows the DNS-SD TXT record key:

```
vendorName=
```

The system interprets the value as an <= 63-byte UTF-8 string and may truncate it if it’s longer than 63 bytes. Refer to [https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6763#section-6.3] for more information on the over-the-air encoding.

## Receiving device information

- **modelName**: The human-readable model name of the physical device as a person can understand it.
- **pairingName**: The human-readable name of the physical device as a person sees it during initial pairing.
